doc:
Bruce Abbott https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bruce_Abbott 0 Bruce Paul Abbott (born July 28, 1954) is an American film, stage, and television actor. Originally beginning his career in theater, Abbott later gained notoriety for his role as Dr. Dan Cain in the cult sci-fi horror films Re-Animator (1985) and Bride of Re-Animator (1990).He has also had roles in the horror films Bad Dreams (1988) and The Prophecy II (1996), as well as the sci-fi film Out of Time. From 1992 to 1993, he portrayed Judge Nicholas Marshall on the television series Dark Justice. Bruce_Paul_Abbott ( born July_28_,_1954 ) is an_American_film , stage , and television_actor . Originally beginning his_career in theater , Abbott later gained notoriety for his_role as Dr._Dan_Cain in the_cult_sci-fi_horror_films Re-Animator_(_1985_)_and_Bride of Re-Animator_(_1990_) . He has_also_had roles in the_horror_films Bad_Dreams ( 1988_) and The_Prophecy_II ( 1996_) , as_well_as the_sci-fi_film Out of Time . From 1992 to 1993 , he portrayed Judge_Nicholas_Marshall on the_television_series_Dark_Justice .
